title: Game Center Shoujo to Ibunka Kouryuu
original_name: ゲーセン少女と異文化交流
sinopse:
The main character, Renji Kusakabe, is working part-time at an arcade. He meets Lily, a British girl, and they somehow start an exchange diary!? Is this a cross-cultural exchange between friends or something more...?

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)
